TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to save hostspot parameters.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'GENERAL PARAMETERS' tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'GENERAL PARAMETERS' tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'GENERAL PARAMETERS' tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select 'Default Date Range'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select 'Default Date Range'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select 'Default Date Range'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter 'Default Resolution Distance - in meters'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter 'Default Resolution Distance - in meters'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter 'Default Resolution Distance - in meters'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter 'Default Corridor Length - in meters'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter 'Default Corridor Length - in meters'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter 'Default Corridor Length - in meters'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter 'Default Incremental Length - in meters'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter 'Default Incremental Length - in meters'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter 'Default Incremental Length - in meters'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter 'Qualification Score'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter 'Qualification Score'.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Enter 'Minimum Number of Crashes Required for Crash Type Pattern'.

TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter 'Minimum Number of Crashes Required for Crash Type Pattern'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Save' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Save' button.

TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message 'The record was saved successfully.'.
